          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion and contraction of a gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion und Kontraktion eines Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion et contraction d'un gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão e contração de um gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione e contrazione di un gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση και συστολή του α αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión y contracción de un gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the expansion of a gas when it is heated. Pushing on the piston of the syringe increases the pressure and compresses the gas to its original volume.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">contraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">piston</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubber seal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">syringe</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Expansion eines Gases, 
wenn sie erhitzt wird. Der Druck auf den Kolben der Spritze 
erhöht den Druck und komprimiert das Gas zu seinem ursprünglichen 
Datenträger.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'expansion d'un gaz 
quand elle est chauffée. La poussée sur le piston de la 
seringue augmente la pression et comprime le gaz à son volume 
initial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a expansão de um gás 
quando é aquecida. Empurrar no pistão do syringe aumenta a 
pressão e comprime o gás a seu volume original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'espansione di un 
gas quando è riscaldata. Spingendo sul pistone della siringa 
aumenta la pressione e comprime il gas al relativo volume originale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την επέκταση αέριο 
πότε θερμαίνεται. Η ώθηση στο έμβολο της σύριγγας αυξάνει 
την πίεση και συμπιέζει αέριο στην αρχική ένταση του ήχου 
της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la extensión de un gas
cuando se calienta. El empujar en el pistón de la jeringuilla 
aumenta la presión y comprime el gas a su volumen original.</string>
          </description>
